coreAttributes.name: L1A1
coreAttributes.description: A light automatic rifle chambered in 7.62x51mm NATO, the L1A1 is the British version of the FN FAL. Notable once for its prototypes' use of a intermediate cartridge and its development for a peacekeeping force, the FAL rarely sees use outside of South America anymore.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Use your L1A1 to fire a single bullet at your target.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out [npc.her] L1A1 and [npc.verb(disengage)] the safety, putting it into a state where it's ready to be used in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Taking aim with [npc.her] L1A1, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger and [npc.verb(fire)] a round at [npc2.name], hitting [npc2.her] directly!

missDescriptions.missText: Taking aim with [npc.her] L1A1, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger and fires a bullet at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
